page.title: 17Population of the village
page.content: The population of Llangeitho is 132. 63 are male and 69 are female. There are 61 dwellings, 42 of which are occupied by Welsh speaking families and 19 by English speakers. The population consists of 93 whose first language is Welsh and 39 who have English as their first language. All the native Welsh are bilingual but only two of the adult English immigrants can converse in Welsh. 82 of the Welsh speakers and 38 of the English speakers are over the age of 18. 30 of the Welsh speakers are over 65 and 7 of the English speakers are also in this category. Of the 12 youngsters under the age of 18, 7 are Welsh speakers and 5 have English as their first language. There are only 2 children under the age of 4.
